programme.title: Incredible Tales S7
programme.desc: Jamie is a young, ambitious Senior Hospital Registrar, with the world ahead of him. A rising star of the Medical Profession, he has everything that one could ask for, and leads a life that most can only dream of. An unusual meeting with an odd elderly patient, threatens to change all that, as his darkest secret, is about to unravel, in a way that he could never imagine.

programme.title: Transplant S3
programme.desc: Mags gets evicted and meets an old patient who holds a grudge. Theo makes some questionable choices with a patient's mother. June's personal and professional worlds collide.

programme.title: Lingo UK S1
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S24
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Weather Gone Viral S8
programme.desc: From whirling tornadoes to torrential rains, to harrowing hurricanes, Weather Gone Viral gives viewers unprecedented access to some of the most insane meteorological moments from around the world. Featuring videos of the most extreme and destructive weather conditions, firsthand accounts, and professional meteorologists sharing tales from the front lines, viewers get to experience the fury of Mother Nature.

programme.title: Press Your Luck S1
programme.desc: Hosted by Elizabeth Banks, Press Your Luck is a game of wits, strategy and even higher stakes as contestants try to avoid the iconic and devilish WHAMMY for a chance at life-changing cash and prizes. During each game of Press Your Luck, three contestants compete against each other, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S3
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze are two young forest monsters that snuck in one day out of the rain. They are a brother and sister, who liked the place so much they decided to stay. (Monsters sometimes do that and it's not even considered rude - but that's just monsters). Anyway, they're all living together in Bibi's magical house even though sometimes Hiccup and Sneeze don't really understand that being a monster and being a human are two very different things...

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C
programme.desc: Miss P discovers that all her Positive Agents like nursery rhymes that have something to do with night and day! This being the case, she sets her agents the task of learning more about night and day and things related to them. The LETTER OF THE DAY is 'm' and the words are mask, moon and mango.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S2
programme.desc: Captain Redbeard's treasure has gone missing so Number Squad have come in to help find it! Farmer Haywire keeps counting her ducklings over and over again but he can't figure out why! Can the Number Squad help him find out why?

programme.title: Einstein's Tingkat
programme.desc: Kristiansen took on the role of a chef in Einstein's Tingkat, a cooking and arts show where he and a group of children, playing chefs too, would draw the dishes they wanted to cook before bringing the recipes to life.

programme.title: Pororo the Little Penguin 8
programme.desc: Join Pororo and friends in their fun adventures!

programme.title: Pororo the Little Penguin 8
programme.desc: Join Pororo and friends in their fun adventures!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Catch! Teenieping
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) Princess Romi accidentally let go of her magical fairies, called Teeniepings. She and her friends are now on a mission to catch all her Teeniepings!

programme.title: Catch! Teenieping
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) Princess Romi accidentally let go of her magical fairies, called Teeniepings. She and her friends are now on a mission to catch all her Teeniepings!

programme.title: Chimera Keepers: Adventures with Incredible Creatures
programme.desc: Join Thelma and Wendy on an extraordinary summer adventure, discovering the unique and magical Chimera creatures!

programme.title: Chimera Keepers: Adventures with Incredible Creatures
programme.desc: Join Thelma and Wendy on an extraordinary summer adventure, discovering the unique and magical Chimera creatures!

programme.title: Dogmatix and the Indomitables S2
programme.desc: Idefix and his indomitable friends Bantera, Stamina and Gluttonix are back to resist the Romans! There's no doubt they will triumph through their unwavering friendship and combined talents, in 52 new and unprecedented adventures filled with adventure and humor, by Toutatis!

programme.title: Dogmatix and the Indomitables S2
programme.desc: Idefix and his indomitable friends Bantera, Stamina and Gluttonix are back to resist the Romans! There's no doubt they will triumph through their unwavering friendship and combined talents, in 52 new and unprecedented adventures filled with adventure and humor, by Toutatis!

programme.title: Agents Of Sprawl
programme.desc: Victory at last! ...Or not. Zayd, Meiling and UnyX are trapped into a dreamlike Sprawl, where Thought 8 tries to tempt them with everything they ever wanted. Meanwhile, back in the real world, Norman fights to escape mind-zombies. Is the team going to be stuck like this forever?

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark S2
programme.desc: After the end of the Transformers' war, the Malto family moves to Witwicky, Pennsylvania, to start a new life but their lives soon get entangled with a group of Terran Transformers.

programme.title: Totally Spies S5
programme.desc: Three teenage girls from Beverly Hills attempt to balance their lives as high school (later university) students with their undercover work as super-spies, battling an array of bizarre criminals!

programme.title: National Stem Championship 2025
programme.desc: It's D-Day, and 4 teams have the chance to become the champion of the National Stem Championship 2025. 3 rounds decide the victor – an outdoor challenge where they decide on coastal protection measures, a mystery challenge, and a Rapid Response round. Which school will be a worthy winner? Celebrities Germaine Tan, Ravi G, Jernelle Oh and Hafiz Aziz add their support!

programme.title: Johnny Test S6
programme.desc: The adventures of average suburban boy Johnny Test, who wittingly plays test subject for his genius twin sisters' various experiments, reluctantly fighting evil villains in the process.

programme.title: Slugterra S2
programme.desc: Slugterra is an epic sci-fi comedy adventure set deep underground, where the ammo's alive and only the quick survive! In this luminous, high-tech, underground world every cavern holds a new adventure, new battle and weird little slugs to be discovered!

programme.title: The Jungle Bunch S3
programme.desc: The Jungle Bunch tells the story of a group of loopy animals fighting injustice in the heart of the jungle, where every being who faces a problem knows who to call...."The Jungle Bunch: to the Rescue!".

programme.title: The Jungle Bunch S3
programme.desc: The Jungle Bunch tells the story of a group of loopy animals fighting injustice in the heart of the jungle, where every being who faces a problem knows who to call...."The Jungle Bunch: to the Rescue!".

programme.title: Groom My Room S11
programme.desc: 9 year-old track & field fan Cyrus wants to transform his drab room into a state-of-the art running track. Of course, that is music to the ears of host Charmian Tan and her Groom My Room dream team. Will team captain Cyrus be able to take charge, come up with an inspiring design, give his room a makeover and it to the finish line within 48 hours and a budget of $1.500?

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S24
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S2
programme.desc: The toughest Bake Off of them all is back again. Twelve teams from across Britain compete to craft exquisite entremets, delicious desserts and spectacular showpieces. Who will impress world-renowned judges Benoit Blin and Cherish Finden, and be crowned the winner?

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Adventurer Simon Reeve journeys deep into the heart of some of Earth's last great wildernesses. On our increasingly crowded planet there are still a few remote areas where nature has the upper hand: the last great wildernesses. In this series Simon Reeve ventures further into the unknown than he ever has before, to unlock its secrets and experience nature at its most beautiful and fragile.

programme.title: The Cube USA S1
programme.desc: Dwyane Wade introduces The Cube, 15 square feet of steel-edged plexiglass where simple tasks become challenges; teams have nine lives to win seven games to beat The Cube for a chance to walk away with $250,000.

programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
programme.desc: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Caught in Motion
programme.desc: The series turns the tables on time, unravelling the miraculous moments and remarkable behavior that fill the natural world. Ultra high-speed camera technology and cutting edge graphics allow viewers to decipher and marvel at the beauty and brilliance of animals in action - putting the animal kingdom on "instant replay".

programme.title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
programme.desc: The defiant leader Moses rises up against Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses II, setting six hundred thousand slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Pokemon Trainer Ash Ketchum has a new plan: see the world! But first, he and his partner Pikachu are headed to the opening of the Cerise Laboratory, a research facility dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Pokemon in every region. Ash meets Goh, another boy with boundless curiosity about Pokemon, and both are overjoyed when Professor Cerise asks them to become official research fellows.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: On The Red Dot offers weekly in-depth analysis and discussion on key issues and events that matter to Singaporeans.

programme.title: Planet Action S4
programme.desc: Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released. Each episode you'll get all the secrets straight from your favorite action heroes, get exclusive trivia and special reports from the most dangerous film sets, and get insight information on how the filmmakers make giant monsters come to life. This show is a sci-fi, cowboy, world-destruction, action-combo that will literally blow your mind!

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Zara tells Adina about the bridging course and is put off by the idea when Adina shoots it down. James tries to engineer a situation for Ananya and him to be together away from Singapore. Jessica, meantime, finds out Emily is contemplating abortion.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia Dessert Masters S1
programme.desc: Dessert Masters sees ten of Australia's greatest pastry chefs, chocolate connoisseurs and baking experts battle it out for $100,000.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen
programme.desc: Popular chef Rachel Khoo now lives in the Swedish countryside in a charming, traditional wooden house that serves as her base for the series. In every episode, she meets up with local food producers or a Swedish chef and visits stores and restaurants that focus on Swedish craftsmanship. Then it's back home to the kitchen, where she puts her twist on local recipes, preparing delicious, healthy food that's easy for anyone to cook at home.

programme.title: Provocative
programme.desc: Shufen sees how Caleb steps up and supports her when Wai Keong is injured and hospitalised. Sivan plays into Shirley's hand when she recommends him a job at SimCorp.

programme.title: News Tonight

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Japan
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood has never been to Japan. As far as he's concerned, it's a land without bread - and a land without bread, is a land without bakers. This three-part series sees Britain's favourite baker discover just how wrong he was - and how Japan is fast becoming one of the world's top foodie destinations. Across the series, Paul travels the country sampling regional delicacies and gets taught some of Japan's most famous dishes.

programme.title: Matlock S1
programme.desc: Madeline Matlock rejoins the work force at a prestigious law firm, where she uses her wily tactics to win cases and expose wrongdoing.

programme.title: Sullivan's Crossing - Series 3
programme.desc: Maggie navigates her new life at the Crossing, still processing the loss she suffered during the diner fire. Bestselling author, Helen, comes to the Crossing to finish her new book. programme.title: 阿麦从军
programme.desc: 阿麦得知，当年便是阿四替陈起制作通关文牒送其出关，委托阿四也替自己做一份文牒。阿四看在春娘份上应下，却得知春娘已不在人世，神色惨然。阿麦被几名小混混当作肥羊盯上，拦路抢劫，阿麦一边虚与委蛇，一边伺机逃跑，却正巧碰到常钰青。常钰青在城中没能找到工匠李二牛，却冤家路窄遇到偷取自己路引之人。他原本只想教训阿麦一番，不料阿麦竟从路引上瞧出他身份有异，立时对阿麦动了杀机。阿麦挣扎中引来唐绍义带领的巡逻兵，常钰青迅速逃离，不慎将狼头扳指落在阿麦手中。.

programme.title: 余生正好
programme.desc: 和其他临终护理护士不同，黄舒霖在「慈怀绿洲」日间慈怀中心不会穿上护士制服、偶尔还会在中心的小酒吧为病友调制鸡尾酒。除了改变人们对临终护理的刻板印象，黄舒霖和团队也希望帮助病友重拾生命的热忱、让他们积极地度过生命最后的时光。黄亚义是加入中心最久的病友之一；面对其他病友相继离世，他将如何面对生命的终点？.

programme.title: 空中访民情 2025
programme.desc: 真挚的亲情温暖了本期节目，数码发展及新闻部兼教育部政务部长刘洁敏跟主持人白薇秀大谈育儿经！育有两个儿子的刘洁敏坦言，要在家庭生活与工作之间取得平衡几乎不可能，于是将两者相融合，社区活动也时常成为她的家庭日！她带孩子时尽量不过于依赖数码科技，要减少孩子的荧幕时间又不容易。她有何妙招？.

programme.title: 阿麦从军
programme.desc: 汉堡牢头徐永为搭救阿麦身亡，临终前将独女徐秀儿托付给阿麦。阿麦攥紧信物红绳，在狱霸等人的死命守护下冲下城墙，避开四处烧杀劫掠的北漠兵，去寻找徐秀儿。唐绍义奉命去狱中解决李二牛，却对普通百姓无法下手，决定将其绑在身边。另一边，常钰青禁止手下兵士抢掠，封锁全城搜捕李二牛。阿麦从行凶的北漠兵手中救下徐秀儿，阻止其轻生行为，承诺必平安送她出城。唐绍义带着李二牛躲避北漠兵搜捕，危急之际，阿麦与徐秀儿救下二人。两方汇合，唐绍义必须尽快出城报信。.

programme.title: 镇乡之宝
programme.desc: 锆石，是地球上最古老的矿物之一，形成约两百万年前。柬埔寨的腊塔纳基里省，又名‘宝石山'的镇乡之宝，就是独特的蓝色锆石！锆石产业是这里的主要经济命脉，为当地土著带来了可观的收入，并改变了他们的生活面貌。.

programme.desc: 晚清末年，社会动荡，净坛密藏宝图失窃，各方势力争夺。曾为御前侍卫的门三刀受命追回宝图，揭露幕后黑手。天津大沽县发生命案，九名死者由融天岭门人所杀，县衙捕快王地保独自追查凶手。与此同时，融天岭掌门卓不凡与淇亲王密谋联手夺宝，图谋利用宝藏来实现各自目的。三人不约而同前往上海，却无意间卷入一场波澜壮阔的历史风波。.

programme.title: 阿麦从军
programme.desc: 阿麦与唐绍义纵马带着徐秀儿和李二牛冲入汉堡城外山林，以为甩掉了追兵，却冷不丁看到中箭的李二牛跌下马背。阿麦应承李二牛，会将鞭箭制法传承下去，用来守护百姓平安。阿麦等人安葬了李二牛，就此兵分两路。阿麦决定去青州找商易之帮忙出关，唐绍义委托阿麦去青州报信，自己则去豫州求援。另一边，常钰青因私自攻城受元帅陈起派人斥责，得知李二牛死讯，已知无法可解，整军继续奔赴秦山。阿麦带徐秀儿去往青州，一路上二人相依相伴，徐秀儿对阿麦渐生依赖之心。。.

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 1953年那个初冬的早晨，台湾眷村里，邓家第四个孩子，“丫头”邓丽君（陈妍希饰）诞生。丫头在歌唱方面的才华幼时便已显现，无奈父亲邓枢（侯勇饰）坚决反对。邓枢退伍，开始了市场摆摊生涯。丫头不解父亲心中的抑郁和乡愁，但她成了父亲卖包子馒头的小帮手。小学毕业后，丫头未能考上初中。但已透过电台歌唱比赛获胜成为歌唱节目的固定班底。邓枢在市场摆摊与流氓发生冲突，被殴打成伤，还闹上了官司。深夜里，夫妇俩感慨这一切只因没有固定店面所致。丫头听在耳里，心疼父母，成为签约歌手并预支薪水，用这笔钱替父亲顶下了店面，邓枢知道后感动不已。丫头终于顺利登台，获得许多好评。.

programme.title: 骑心协力
programme.desc: 对公路骑行心存恐惧的Naomi和不擅长运动的Das，将在越南并肩完成570公里的征途。从荣市到会安，穿越越南古都与战争地道，看见历史的沉重，也在烈日、逆风与精疲力竭的攀登中，找到了勇气与自信。.

programme.title: 命运使者

programme.desc: 《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响。.

programme.title: 天行健
programme.desc: 晚清末年，社会动荡，净坛密藏宝图失窃，各方势力争夺。曾为御前侍卫的门三刀受命追回宝图，揭露幕后黑手。天津大沽县发生命案，九名死者由融天岭门人所杀，县衙捕快王地保独自追查凶手。与此同时，融天岭掌门卓不凡与淇亲王密谋联手夺宝，图谋利用宝藏来实现各自目的。三人不约而同前往上海，却无意间卷入一场波澜壮阔的历史风波。.

programme.title: 阿麦从军
programme.desc: 青州城外山路设立路障关卡，由青州军把守。商易之衣衫褴褛地带着阿麦等人准备进城，却因无路引，被当成细作准备拿下。幸得定南侯府车队仪仗及时赶到，亮出侯府令牌，商易之等人才顺利入城。商易之做东感谢阿麦，答应派人回盛都帮她办理通关文牒。阿麦为等候文牒，暂时留在商易之身边。商易之遵照母亲叮嘱，找到隐居青州的谋士徐静，徐静将青州可用的两位将军介绍给商易之。商易之满怀信心上任守将，可去了军营才知，徐静所言可用之人已连夜接到调令离开，钱校尉等将领对商易之更是敷衍了事，青州军并不像商易之想的那般认他为主将。.

programme.title: 三吃客
programme.desc: 螃蟹的美味人人爱，螃蟹的煮法也千变万化。三吃客将在节目中介绍三道不同的螃蟹料理，一道是旅客来到新加坡必吃的国菜~辣椒螃蟹，还有创新煮法的螃蟹，以及软壳蟹包，都是让人垂涎三尺的美食。他们也到访螃蟹批发店，学习怎么分辨公蟹母蟹，及认识不同种类的螃蟹。.

programme.title: 想握你的手
programme.desc: 以本地的社会时事为骨架，描述同一个邻里几个不同背景的家庭，如何由冷漠自我，到最终了解何谓"爱"。故事反映了血浓于水、守望相助、远亲不如近邻的可贵精神。新传媒艺人黄文永在此剧中饰演父亲，是一家咖啡店的老板，为人节俭，有三个女儿，分别由林湘萍、李心钰和蔡佩璇饰演，而陈丽萍则饰演文永的妻子。.

programme.title: 命运使者
programme.desc: 春林在2025年的生活每况愈下，便索性躲到1930年寻得慰藉。海景大酒店的Jimmy与春林冤家路窄，查出春林的秘密，使其在义兴会的地位变得岌岌可危。舜琴在李珠娘的诊所里帮忙，世界观渐渐改变。.

programme.title: 狮城热话
programme.desc: 周一至周五晚上7点，《狮城有约》谈话性栏目《狮城热话》以汇集多元声音及专家看法为目标，通过网络投票和引导观点碰撞，打造能让观众参与的时事舆论场。.

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 1953年那个初冬的早晨，台湾眷村里，邓家第四个孩子，“丫头”邓丽君（陈妍希饰）诞生。丫头在歌唱方面的才华幼时便已显现，无奈父亲邓枢（侯勇饰）坚决反对。邓枢退伍，开始了市场摆摊生涯。丫头不解父亲心中的抑郁和乡愁，但她成了父亲卖包子馒头的小帮手。小学毕业后，丫头未能考上初中。但已透过电台歌唱比赛获胜成为歌唱节目的固定班底。邓枢在市场摆摊与流氓发生冲突，被殴打成伤，还闹上了官司。深夜里，夫妇俩感慨这一切只因没有固定店面所致。丫头听在耳里，心疼父母，成为签约歌手并预支薪水，用这笔钱替父亲顶下了店面，邓枢知道后感动不已。丫头终于顺利登台，获得许多好评。.

programme.title: 阿麦从军
programme.desc: 青州军将商易之与阿麦等人分开软禁于城守府，几名校尉商议后，决定把商易之丢进“鬼愁营”自生自灭。阿麦从忠心的管家口中得知城守府里有通向府外的密道，安排穆白潜出，得知商易之下落不明，且两名忠心将领其实并未离开，而是同陷困境。阿麦决定自己去找商易之，由徐静穆白去搭救将领搬救兵。此时，商易之陷入鬼愁营中，数名被困于此的采石工原先均是被老定南侯流放于此的军中逃兵，对商家恨之入骨。商易之为自保，不得不隐姓埋名，与众人虚与委蛇。阿麦在城中打探得知，钱校尉官职不高却家财万贯，必有异常。.

programme.title: 阿贤这么吃 S2
programme.desc: 《阿贤这么吃2 》走入庄园探寻马来西亚产制优质食材，看看各路生产者如何深耕在地物产，从咖啡、牛奶、鱼肉、蔬菜、鸡肉、发酵物到食用菌菇，还有我们刻板印象中唯有欧洲产才属优质品的起司、无花果、鱼子酱与巧克力等等，都将全然是马来西亚在地风土孕育的物产。阿贤也请教餐厅主厨如何将多元多样的风土食材，烹制成日常餐桌上的美味风景线，让土地与餐桌产生紧密连结，且透过不停梳理、复刻与重现，形塑马来西亚饮食的新在地。.

programme.title: 焦点

programme.title: 在世界的角落扎营

In the first 2 weeks, viewers will witness judges from both local and regional music scenes, randomly mixing and matching local singers to determine their chemistry.

programme.title: Iconic Season 2

Explore the unique stories and experiences that define the essence of these remarkable cultures.

With endless curiosity and infectious energy, Skuad Cilik proves that learning is best served with laughter and fun!

programme.title: Sucinya Ratna
programme.desc: A story about a Kirana who sacrifices a lot for her sister. She works in the fish market and they live in modest condition. She works hard to get her sister, Ratna to college. Unfortunately, her sister is not satisfied with her, thus triggering various conflicts between them.

programme.title: Indonesia Heritage
programme.desc: Showcasing the rich cultural heritage that has been worldwide but almost extinct in the city of Indonesia with the handsome and phenomenal traveler, Dimas Beck.

programme.title: Berita
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Pesan Izan
programme.desc: Lately, Izan's rest time is interrupted by loud noises and plates being hurled and broken, coming from the neighbor's home. Being the inquisitive Izan, she musters her courage and tries to talk to her neighbor. Izan is pushed away but little by little, the truth starts to come to light. From loud shouting, the situation escalates quickly.

programme.title: Pesan Izan
programme.desc: It is a mayday situation at Hakim's office! Saiful has been isolating himself in the toilet for a while. He gives no response when his colleagues call him out. Only sounds of the toilet flushing can be heard from the cubicle. This raises his colleague's and boss's concern. Why is Saiful acting that way? Does he need help, perhaps from Izan?

programme.title: Pesan Izan
programme.desc: Nura is persuading Izan to join her company and offering her security. Izan is considering but at this juncture, her freelance career is taking off when she receives house calls. At first, she thinks this new case is one of domestic abuse but little that Izan know, she is facing a tough client, somebody whom she least expects.

programme.title: Pesan Izan
programme.desc: Syakir and Izan become closer as he tries to connect Izan to a bigger network, making Hakim envious. Izan is elated, especially when she meets her favourite radio DJ, DJ Kool. It started from work collaboration but it quickly escalated to personal coaching when DJ Kool starts to display signs of anxiety. He becomes easily agitated when he sees his work spar, DJ Hanis Manis. Izan digs up the root of their feud.

programme.title: Pesan Izan
programme.desc: Izan's latest case is unlike her previous clients. Rina is in and out of trance and this brings chills down Izan's spine. Rina's husband, Murad, has sent her to various doctors, bomoh and even Ustaz but they don't seem to find anything wrong with her. He is at his wits end and Izan is his last resort. Izan tries to get to the bottom of what Rina is suffering from.

programme.title: Pesan Izan
programme.desc: Nura is still trying have Izan join her. Osman on the other hand, rebuts every offer she makes. Still focusing on her career, Izan feels quizzical when she is asked by Khalid to counsel his wife, Bibah. The two appear like any other elderly couple and even greet Izan with a spread full of good home cooked food. Slowly, Izan learns that there is more to Bibah's glorious cooking.

programme.title: Pesan Izan
programme.desc: Syakir is showering Izan extra care and concern, which makes her feel overwhelmed, just like her client, Shidah, who is having difficulty differentiating imaginary and reality. No one can dispute the fact that she is pregnant. Her husband is looking for a quick fix, but they must address their marital issues first. Izan is also surprised to find out that Ilya is interested in Hakim.

programme.title: Pesan Izan
programme.desc: Izan continues to receive backlash and critics which could jeopardise her life coaching career and all these are happening in the midst of an important event. Izan is also in search for reasons behind her parents' separation. It doesn't make it any easier for Izan when Ilya is determined to reveal her feelings to Hakim. Izan is trapped by circumstances.

programme.title: Tangan - Tangan Kecil
programme.desc: Paracale is a town in the Philippines that used to be a thriving gold site during the Spanish rule over 400 years ago. Today, young miners risk their lives mining for remnants of the precious ore using a highly dangerous and banned method called compressor mining. Tangan Tangan Kechil throws light on the plight of these young miners.

programme.title: Ai, Ai, Cef!
programme.desc: In Ai, Ai, Cef!, kids take over the kitchen as head chefs and go head to head in the ultimate cook-off! But every chef needs an assistant, and in AI, AI, CEF, two stars will join our little chefs in their mission to improve the judges - but with their faces hidden behind masks. Who are these assistant chefs? In each episode, two well-known figures --- actors, singers, influencers, athletes, housing agents and more --- join the show as mystery guest.

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat S2
